scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w pures-merchant" "npm run dev -w pures-admin"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @repo/db && npm run build -w pures-merchant && npm run build -w pures-admin
scripts.build:merchant: npm run build -w @repo/db && npm run build -w pures-merchant
scripts.build:admin: npm run build -w @repo/db && npm run build -w pures-admin
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start -w pures-merchant" "npm run start -w pures-admin"
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w pures-merchant && npm run lint -w pures-admin
